sentences.sentence: The monks lived a very ascetic life.
sentences.translation: 僧侣过着很清苦的生活。

sentences.sentence: He is critical of the monks, whom he considers narrow-minded and self-righteous.
sentences.translation: 他对僧侣们颇有微词，认为他们心胸狭隘，自以为是。

sentences.sentence: The Catholic Church had its seven daily prayers, one of which was at night, requiring an alarm arrangement to waken monks before dawn.
sentences.translation: 天主教会每天有七次祈祷，其中一次是在晚上，需要设置闹钟在黎明前叫醒僧侣。
